page.title: 09 WEEDON NEWSPAPER SHOP
page.content: We all went to the newspaper shop and asked the owner some questions. She told us that her family had owned the paper shop for about 40 years.About three years ago they built a new and bigger shop. About fourteen boys and girls deliver the newspapers in the morning and the evening.On Sundays they deliver papers to many other villages as well as to Weedon. Their working day starts at about 04.00 hours and ends at 19.00 hours. Her shop has never been burgled.At their shop they sell most copies of The Sun,The Daily Mirror and The Daily Express.
